"I'm not going back! I am not going to spend the rest of my life in that ba=
se with nothing to do! I say we go out and make something of life, while we=
 still have life left to live." Airbomber said. OOC: Sorry for my absense e=
veryone, but you probably didn't notice that I was gone yesterday...
  ----=
- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com=
 
  Sent: Sunday, August 13, 2000 7:05 PM
  Subject: Re: Airbomber and Infe=
ctra...


  Infectra


  *Infectra sighs and looks around*


  Infectra:  "=
I guess we should go back to base."

  *Infectra says to Airbomber*

    --=
--- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
    Sent: Sunday, August 13, 2000 2:28 AM
    Subject: Re: Airbomber and In=
fectra...


    Airbomber sighs and starts to fall asleep from boredom...
 =
     ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: n=
bwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Sunday, August 13, 2000 1:18 AM
      Subjec=
t: Re: Airbomber and Infectra...


      Infectra


      Infectra:  "Hmm..=
..There are only two of us and there could be many of them. I'm not sure."
=


      *Infectra says to Airbomber*

        ----- Original Message ----- =

        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Sunda=
y, August 13, 2000 1:12 AM
        Subject: Re: Airbomber and Infectra...

=

        Airbomber honestly didn't know where to go.

        "Want to atta=
ck a base?" Airbomber asked Infectra...
          ----- Original Message --=
--- 
          From: ilovealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
   =
       Sent: Saturday, August 12, 2000 8:50 PM
          Subject: Re: Airbo=
mber and Infectra...


          Infectra

           
           
        =
  *Infectra begins walking while looking around herself*

          Infectr=
a:  "Are we going in any place particular?"

          *Infectra asks Airbo=
mber*

            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: THECODE =

            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Saturday, August 12,=
 2000 7:05 PM
            Subject: Re: Airbomber and Infectra...


        =
    Airbomber took Infectra's hand and started to walk...
              ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
              From: ilovealllizards 
           =
   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 10:2=
1 PM
              Subject: Re: Airbomber and Infectra...


              I=
nfectra


              Infectra: "I don't know, I guess he just doesn't wa=
nt to come.."


              *Infectra says to Airbomber while frowning*
 =
               ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: THECODE =

                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Friday, Augu=
st 11, 2000 10:11 PM
                Subject: Re: Airbomber and Infectra...=



                "Okay. Hey, Stranato!" Airbomber called.

              =
  "Go away! Having fun with friends!" Stranato called out.

               =
 "I thought we were his friends." Airbomber said sadly...
                 =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: ilovealllizards 
   =
               To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Friday, Augu=
st 11, 2000 9:55 PM
                  Subject: Re: Airbomber w/ Infectra...=



                  Infectra

                  *Infectra leaves the base =
and stands next to Airbomber and starts thinking*


                  Infec=
tra: "Umm...Should we see if anyone else wants to go with us?"

           =
       *Infectra asks Airbomber with a smile*

                    ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
                    From: THECODE 
                  =
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000=
 9:38 PM
                    Subject: Re: Airbomber w/ Infectra...


      =
              Airbomber left the base and looked off into the distance. He =
started to feel bad about this, they didn't have any friends to help them i=
f they got into trouble...
                      ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
                      From: ilovealllizards 
                      To: =
nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                      Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 8:3=
6 PM
                      Subject: Re: Airbomber w/ Infectra...


        =
              Infectra

                      *Infectra smiles*

          =
            Infectra: "Indeed, we shall be off."

                      *In=
fectra says to Airbomber as she opens the door leading out of their room*

=
                        ----- Original Message ----- 
                     =
   From: THECODE 
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
         =
               Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 6:40 PM
                      =
  Subject: Re: Airbomber w/ Infectra...


                        Airbomber=
 takes her hand.

                        "We can make the Maximals proud."=
 Airbomber said...
                          ----- Original Message ----- 
=
                          From: ilovealllizards 
                          =
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                          Sent: Friday, August 11, =
2000 4:24 AM
                          Subject: Re: Airbomber w/ Infectra..=
.


                          Infectra


                          Infectra=
: "Hmm...Sounds good to me."

                          *Infectra stands up=
*

                          Infectra: "Shall we?"

                       =
   *Infectra says to Airbomber smiling holding her hand out*

             =
               ----- Original Message ----- 
                            Fr=
om: THECODE 
                            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          =
                  Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 3:29 AM
                   =
         Subject: Airbomber w/ Infectra...


                            "S=
o, want to gop outside or something? See the world, capture out first Preds=
?" Airbomber asked Infectra. He lenaed over and kissed her...
